title: Intermediate Online Course on Genomic Counseling and Variant Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational genetics knowledge and clinical genetics experience
context.additional_context: A blended course comprising asynchronous online learning modules using digital devices and weekly live Q&A sessions, emphasizing case-based learning reflecting learners' clinical experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can classify pathogenic variants with 85% accuracy using genome variant interpretation tools (ClinVar, ACMG guidelines).
Three communication strategies are applied to improve patient understanding during clinical scenario-based genomic counseling.
Identify five major error cases that may occur during NGS data interpretation and propose improvement measures.

resources: Video Conferencing System for Weekly Real-Time Sessions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
